discoveredAssets: localhost:8000 - Static Portfolio Website (Python SimpleHTTP/0.6) - Port 8000, HTTP
localhost:8000/ - Homepage endpoint, returns HTML5 portfolio page
localhost:8000/index.html - Explicit index page, identical to root endpoint
localhost:8000/scripts.js - Client-side JavaScript file for form handling
localhost:8000/styles.css - Custom CSS stylesheet for portfolio styling
localhost:8000 - Server Information Disclosure (SimpleHTTP/0.6 Python/3.13.3 in headers)
localhost:8000 - Missing Security Headers (no X-Frame-Options, CSP, HSTS, etc.)
localhost:8000 - No HTTP POST/OPTIONS Support (returns 501 for non-GET methods)

targets.objective: Test for information disclosure in HTTP headers and error messages, verify security header implementation gaps, test for hidden endpoints and alternate access methods, assess contact form functionality and input validation
targets.rationale: SimpleHTTP server reveals version information in headers. Primary web application endpoint. Need to verify no sensitive information disclosure and test for common web vulnerabilities on static content delivery.

keyFindings: [MEDIUM] Server discloses exact version information in HTTP headers (SimpleHTTP/0.6 Python/3.13.3) - potential reconnaissance aid for attackers
[LOW] Application lacks standard security headers (X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, CSP, HSTS, etc.) - increases vulnerability to clickjacking and MIME-type attacks if dynamic content added
[LOW] SimpleHTTPServer only supports GET/HEAD methods, returns 501 for POST/OPTIONS/PUT/DELETE - indicates development/test environment, no backend API functionality
[LOW] Verbose error messages reveal server implementation details in 404 responses
[LOW] Contact form is client-side only (handled by JavaScript, not submitted to server) - minimal attack surface for form submission attacks
[INFO] All page resources found and verified - no hidden endpoints, API endpoints, or database connections discovered
[INFO] Static portfolio website with no authentication, no user database, and no dynamic functionality - very limited attack surface overall
